author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Colombian rebels call ceasefire over virus
description: The ELN rebel group said it would lay down arms from 1 April for a month as a "humanitarian gesture".
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The ELN rebels released a statement announcing the one-month unilateral ceasefire
The left-wing National Liberation Army (ELN) rebel group in Colombia has declared a unilateral ceasefire for a month starting on 1 Ap… [+2050 chars]
